channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Chicago, Baltimore and New Orleans are reacting to Trump's National Guard threats
item.description: Even after a federal court ruled his use of the National Guard in LA was illegal, the president has weighed sending troops to Chicago, Baltimore and N...

item.title: Headed to the FBI, Missouri's Andrew Bailey opposed abortion, backed Trump
item.description: Andrew Bailey rose quickly to be state attorney general of Missouri where he built a record for fighting abortion and defending Donald Trump. Now he's...

item.title: Anthropic to pay authors $1.5B to settle lawsuit over pirated chatbot training material
item.description: The artificial intelligence company Anthropic has agreed to pay authors $3,000 per book in a landmark settlement over pirated chatbot training materia...

item.title: You can trust the jobs report, Labor Department workers urge public
item.description: A strongly-worded statement from Bureau of Labor Statistics workers comes a month after President Trump attacked the integrity of the jobs numbers the...

item.title: Hundreds of South Koreans are among 475 detained in a Georgia immigration raid
item.description: "The business activities of our investors and the rights of our nationals must not be unjustly infringed," a foreign ministry spokesman said after abo...

item.title: Scientists tap ‘secret’ fresh water under the ocean, raising hopes for a thirsty world
Hamas releases video of two Israeli hostages held in Gaza
item.description: The video claims to show the two men in Gaza City, where Israel has begun a planned military takeover.

item.title: Putin rejects Western security in Ukraine, warning troops would be target
item.description: The Russian leader's refusal comes after 26 countries pledged to deploy troops to Ukraine in the event of a ceasefire.

item.title: Homeland security official says 475 people were detained during an immigration raid in Georgia
A deadly crash, a divided nation: Why Sikh truckers are now in the crossfire
item.description: Members of California’s Sikh trucking community say a deadly crash involving one of its own has led to a spike in anti-Sikh rhetoric.

item.title: Trump signs executive order renaming Defense to Department of War
item.description: President Trump singed an executive order Friday directing the Department of Defense to use the name Department of War as a "secondary title" — restor...

item.title: Economists' top 3 takeaways from the dismal August jobs report
item.description: Employers added far fewer jobs last month than economists had predicted, prompting some experts to reassess the economy.

item.title: Google fined €2.95bn by EU for abusing advertising dominance
item.description: The Commission said competitors faced higher costs and reduced revenues as a result.

item.title: Three ways Epstein scandal could go for Trump
item.description: This week the victims of Epstein's crimes came forward to demand more information, piling pressure on the White House.

item.title: "No question that the economy is slowing," economics professor says
item.description: The U.S. economy added 22,000 non-farm jobs in August, below the 75,000 forecast by leading economists. Unemployment ticked up to 4.3%. CBS News' Jo L...

item.title: Judge rules against Trump in attempt to end protections for Venezuelans, Haitians
item.description: U.S. District Judge Edward Chen ruled against the Trump administration in a challenge to its effort to end the Temporary Protected Status program for ...

item.title: Hundreds of South Koreans detained in massive ICE raid at Hyundai plant
item.description: Most of the 475 arrested were from South Korea, leading the country to express concern about the rights of those in custody.

item.title: Texas Democrat James Talarico to launch Senate bid next week
item.description: Democratic lawmaker James Talarico is jumping into next year's Texas Senate race, sources tell CBS News.
